about_the_game:
You are a soldier in Spain in 1938. You must infiltrate the enemy's territory to retrieve sensitive information. It's an infiltration mission that awakens memories in you of an old relationship that you think has disappeared.

In this "Walking Simulator" game you will find puzzles in which the solution lies in knowing how to find your way through a town hall destroyed by war. Through keys and maps scatered arround the building you will advance and discover the story that is told to the player through the messages written on a typewriter.

These messages are the letters sent to each other by Juan and Antón, the protagonists of the story. In these you can see how the war has affected them, what their true relationship truly is. The letters show the things they did not share and only the two of them experienced.

Includes:

  • Immersive environment of a town hall in the Spanish Civil War.

  • Linear love story that tells you about the relationship between two men before, during and after a war.

  • Puzzles that are solved thanks to the player's ability to orient themselves and read maps.

  • In-game cinematics about the story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2500 or Intel Core I5 8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: It's a first-person game in which you'll have to find your way around a decaying building to find the information you've been sent to find. But along the way you might find something else.
